scripts.simple_build: cd ../shared_libs && npm install && cd ../config && npm install
scripts.start_local_zalenium: docker pull elgalu/selenium && cd .. && docker-compose -f docker-compose-quality-assurance.yml up -d --force-recreate zalenium
scripts.run_with_docker_local: npm run simple_build && export TEST_ENV=local && cd .. && docker-compose -f docker-compose-quality-assurance.yml up config
scripts.run_with_docker_local_dev: npm run simple_build && export TEST_ENV=localDev && cd .. && docker-compose -f docker-compose-quality-assurance.yml up config
scripts.run_with_docker_jenkins: npm run simple_build && export TEST_ENV=jenkins && cd .. && docker-compose -f docker-compose-quality-assurance.yml up config
